TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttribute extends System.Xml.XmlNode

summary.span: 代表屬性。

span.span: Represents an attribute.

summary.span: 該屬性的有效和預設值會在文件類型定義 (DTD) 或結構描述中定義。

span.span: Valid and default values for the attribute are defined in a document type definition (DTD) or schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以與項目相關聯的屬性。Attributes can be associated with an element. 使用屬性來取得所屬的屬性。Use the property to get the to which the attribute belongs. `XmlElement`類別有數種方法可讓您存取屬性節點 (， ，等等)。The `XmlElement` class has several methods which allow you to access attribute nodes (, , , and so on). 此外，您可以呼叫屬性，會傳回讓您存取集合中的依名稱或索引的屬性。Additionally, you can call the property, which returns an enabling you to access attributes by name or index from the collection.

The added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`newChild`是已經在樹狀目錄中，則會先移除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果要插入的節點建立另一個文件中，您可以使用匯入目前的文件的節點。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 匯入的節點則可以插入至目前的文件。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. ## Examples 如需方法，請參閱方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

span.span: The was created from a different document than the one that created this node.

exception.span: 這個節點是唯讀的。

span.span: This node is read-only.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseURI As String

summary.span: 取得節點的基底統一資源識別元 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the base Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the node.

value.span: 節點載入的位置；如果節點沒有基底 URI，則為 String.Empty。

span.span: The location from which the node was loaded or String.Empty if the node has no base URI.

value.span: 屬性節點的基底 URI 與其擁有人項目的相同。

span.span: Attribute nodes have the same base URI as their owner element.

value.span: 如果屬性節點沒有擁有人項目， 會傳回 String.Empty。

span.span: If an attribute node does not have an owner element, returns String.Empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路上的 XML 文件使用不同的 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 標準包含機制進行彙總的資料區塊所組成，並因此會包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI`會告訴您這些節點的來源。The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from. 如需詳細資訊`BaseURI`以及如何它的行為與其他節點型別，請參閱。For additional information on `BaseURI` and how it behaves with other node types, see . 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在 [屬性] 節點，包括其基底 URI 資訊。The following example displays information on the attribute node, including its base URI. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`baseuri.xml`作為輸入。The sample uses the file, `baseuri.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.BaseURI Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

param.span: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 ，若只要複製節點本身，則為 。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself

summary.span: 建立這個節點的複本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this node.
The duplicate node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會做為節點的複製建構函式。This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes. 複製的節點有沒有父代 (傳回`null`)。The cloned node has no parent ( returns `null`). 複製未指定的屬性會傳回指定的屬性 (傳回`true`)。Cloning an unspecified attribute returns a specified attribute ( returns `true`). ## Examples 下列範例會使用`CloneNode`將屬性新增至兩個不同的項目節點。The following example uses `CloneNode` to add an attribute to two different element nodes. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`2elems.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `2elems.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.CloneNode Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

span.span: The that is the reference node.

param.span: NewChild 會置於 refChild 之後。

summary.span: 在指定的參考節點之後，插入指定的節點。

span.span: Inserts the specified node immediately after the specified reference node.
The inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`refChild`已`null`，插入`newChild`的子節點清單開頭。If `refChild` is `null`, insert `newChild` at the beginning of the list of child nodes. 如果`newChild`已物件，其所有子節點都插入，以相同的順序之後, `refChild`。If `newChild` is an object, its child nodes are inserted, in the same order, after `refChild`. 如果`newChild`是已經在樹狀目錄中，則會先移除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果要插入的節點建立另一個文件中，您可以使用匯入目前的文件的節點。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 匯入的節點則可以插入至目前的文件。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能文件物件模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 如需方法，請參閱方法。For an example of the method see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`refChild`已`null`，插入`newChild`子節點清單結尾。If `refChild` is `null`, insert `newChild` at the end of the list of child nodes. 如果`newChild`已物件，其所有子節點都插入，以相同的順序，之前`refChild`。If `newChild` is an object, its child nodes are inserted, in the same order, before `refChild`. 如果`newChild`是已經在樹狀目錄中，則會先移除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果要插入的節點建立另一個文件中，您可以使用匯入目前的文件的節點。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 匯入的節點則可以插入至目前的文件。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. ## Examples 如需方法，請參閱方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

span.span: If the attribute is not explicitly given a namespace, this property returns String.Empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會從附加至項目繼承其命名空間。An attribute does not inherit its namespace from the element it is attached to. 如果屬性未明確指定命名空間，命名空間 URI 是被視為 String.Empty。If an attribute is not explicitly given a namespace, the namespace URI is considered to be String.Empty. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在每個屬性集合中之節點上的資訊。The following example displays information on each of the nodes in the attribute collection. span.span: If there is no prefix, this property returns String.Empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更屬性的前置詞不會變更其命名空間 URI，因為變更成具有預設值就是屬性的前置詞不會建立新屬性的預設值與原始的前置詞。Because changing the prefix of an attribute does not change its namespace URI, changing the prefix of an attribute that is known to have a default value does not create a new attribute with the default value and the original prefix. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在每個屬性集合中之節點上的資訊。The following example displays information on each of the nodes in the attribute collection. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlAttribute.NamespaceURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`newChild`是已經在樹狀目錄中，則會先移除。If the `newChild` is already in the tree, it is first removed. 如果要插入的節點建立另一個文件中，您可以使用匯入目前的文件的節點。If the node being inserted was created from another document, you can use to import the node to the current document. 匯入的節點則可以插入至目前的文件。The imported node can then be inserted into the current document. 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能文件物件模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 如需方法，請參閱方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Specified { get; }
.property instance bool Specified
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Specified As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Specified { bool get(); };
member this.Specified : bool

summary.span: 取得值，表示是否明確設定屬性值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the attribute value was explicitly set.

value.span: 如果在原始執行個體文件中明確指定了這個屬性的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this attribute was explicitly given a value in the original instance document; otherwise, .

value.span: 值指示屬性的值是來自 DTD。

span.span: A value of indicates that the value of the attribute came from the DTD.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作會負責這個屬性，而非使用者。The implementation is in charge of this property, not the user. 如果使用者變更 （即使它最後都會有相同的值做為預設/固定值） 屬性的值，然後指定的旗標會自動翻轉至`true`。If the user changes the value of the attribute (even if it ends up having the same value as the default/fixed value), then the specified flag is automatically flipped to `true`. 若要重新指定做為 DTD 中的預設/固定值的屬性，使用者必須刪除屬性。To re-specify the attribute as the default/fixed value from the DTD, the user must delete the attribute. 實作接著會使用指定的集合的新屬性`false`及預設/固定值 （如果有的話）。The implementation then makes a new attribute available with specified set to `false` and the default/fixed value (if one exists). 歸納起來：In summary: 1. 如果屬性在文件中具有指派的值`Specified`是`true`，而值是指派的值。If the attribute has an assigned value in the document, `Specified` is `true`, and the value is the assigned value. 2. 如果屬性文件中沒有任何指派的值，且在 DTD 中，具有預設/固定數值`Specified`是`false`，而值是在 DTD 中的預設/固定值。If the attribute has no assigned value in the document and has a default/fixed value in the DTD, `Specified` is `false`, and the value is the default/fixed value in the DTD. 3. 否則，屬性不會不會出現在文件的結構模型。Otherwise, the attribute does not appear in the structure model of the document.
